verses.name: Hebrews 10:9
verses.text: Then said he, Lo, I come to do thy will, O God. He taketh away the first, that he may establish the second.

verses.name: Hebrews 10:10
verses.text: By the which will we are sanctified through the offering of the body of Jesus Christ once for all.

verses.name: Hebrews 10:11
verses.text: And every priest standeth daily ministering and offering oftentimes the same sacrifices, which can never take away sins:

verses.name: Hebrews 10:12
verses.text: But this man, after he had offered one sacrifice for sins for ever, sat down on the right hand of God;

verses.name: Hebrews 10:13
verses.text: From henceforth expecting till his enemies be made his footstool.
